audioText: Cette peur viscale de l'échec paralyse souvent les individus les plus talentueux et les empêche de réaliser leur véritable potentiel créatif et professionnel.
question: What effect does this fear have on talented individuals?
options: It paralyzes them and prevents them from realizing their true creative and professional potential.
It motivates them to work harder and achieve better results.
It helps them focus on their most important goals.
It has no significant impact on their performance.
explanation: The speaker explains 'Cette peur viscérale de l'échec paralyse souvent les individus les plus talentueux et les empêche de réaliser leur véritable potentiel créatif et professionnel' - This visceral fear of failure often paralyzes the most talented individuals and prevents them from realizing their true creative and professional potential.
source: Psychology of performance and fear of failure
